desc: Proficient in creating structured and semantically correct web pages using HTML5.
Strong skills in styling web applications with CSS and SCSS for maintainable and responsive design.
Proficient in using Bootstrap to create responsive and consistent layouts.
Familiarity with Chakra UI for designing modern and accessible user interfaces.
Proficient in writing JavaScript code to add interactivity and functionality to web pages.
Capable in using jQuery for simplifying DOM manipulation and creating interactive elements.
Skilled in developing user-friendly, high-performance web applications with React.
Capable of effectively employing Git/GitHub in collaborative software development.
Adept at effectively using VS Code for collaborative software development.
Proficient in using Figma for designing user interfaces and prototypes.
Strong understanding of the Java programming language.
Proficient in relational database management and SQL queries.
